body_html:
Regarding tf.strided_slice, TOCO seems to be generally aware of negative indices.
But here it expects (stop_index - start_index) and op->strides[axis] to be of the same sign.

int dim_size = ceil(static_cast<float>(stop_index - start_index) / op->strides[axis]);
CHECK_GT(dim_size, 0)

The values begin=[1], end=[0], strides=[1] should be either of these:

  • begin=[0], end=[1], strides=[1]
  • begin=[1], end=[0], strides=[-1]
body_text:
Regarding tf.strided_slice, TOCO seems to be generally aware of negative indices.
But here it expects (stop_index - start_index) and op->strides[axis] to be of the same sign.
int dim_size = ceil(static_cast<float>(stop_index - start_index) / op->strides[axis]);
CHECK_GT(dim_size, 0)

The values begin=[1], end=[0], strides=[1] should be either of these:

begin=[0], end=[1], strides=[1]
begin=[1], end=[0], strides=[-1]
body:
Regarding `tf.strided_slice`, TOCO seems to be generally aware of negative indices.
But here it expects (stop_index - start_index) and op->strides[axis] to be of the same sign.
```
int dim_size = ceil(static_cast<float>(stop_index - start_index) / op->strides[axis]);
CHECK_GT(dim_size, 0)
```
The values `begin=[1], end=[0], strides=[1]` should be either of these:
* `begin=[0], end=[1], strides=[1]`
* `begin=[1], end=[0], strides=[-1]`
